servicesSection.service1Title: Competitive Price and No Hidden Fees
servicesSection.service1Text: Enjoy transparent and advantageous rates, lower than our competitors. Your price is set in advance: no unexpected surcharges, no hidden fees, only reliable and affordable service.
servicesSection.service2Text: Travel in a top-of-the-line vehicle, perfectly maintained, for a pleasant and serene experience. Enjoy personalized attention, bottled water, phone charger and music of your choice, for an enjoyable and tailor-made journey.
servicesSection.service3Title: Free Cancellation (up to 10 hours in advance)
servicesSection.service3Text: Plan your journeys with complete peace of mind: you can cancel for free up to 10 hours before your departure. Flexibility and simplicity are at the heart of our service, to offer you maximum peace of mind.

aboutPage.title: ABOUT ME
aboutPage.intro1:
Your simple and reliable solution for all your trips to Lisbon.
Our mission is clear: to make your journeys pleasant, safe and stress-free.
aboutPage.intro2: We created this service with one idea in mind: to offer quality private transport accessible to all. Whether it's for a daily commute, a business meeting, a transfer to a train station or airport, we adapt to your needs.
aboutPage.intro3: With transparent rates, attentive drivers and easy bookings, we do everything to offer you a practical and warm service.
